name: Ryan Rana
title: Software Engineer & AI Enthusiast
bio: i'm interested in solving problems with agents[1], VLMs[4], robots[5] & scalable systems[6]. as a swe, i prioritize technical depth[7] and high agency[8] for improvement.

i'm doing cs @ Rutgers[9] & i'm a med swe @ [Centren Health](https://centrenhealth.com/)[10], prev co-founder @ [Mesh](https://www.joinmesh.today/)[11]. I also built a lot of other cool [software](https://github.com/RyanRana) over many domains in the past 6 years[12].

when Claude[13] can't debug my slop, i like to [write](https://ryanranas.medium.com/)[14], ski[15], [craft](pages/wood.html) & eat Chipotle[16]. i'm always seeking geniune collobaration and connection.

references.title: agents
references.description: built multi-step agent systems with memory, iterative feedback, rag & domain-specific constraints like Osler[2] for hospitalists, Aura[3] for enterprise.

references.title: Osler
references.description: hospitalist agent that handles onboarding and live workflow. adapts to all types of data and tools, runs under real hospital rules.

references.title: Aura
references.description: internal enterprise agent platform that interacts with Snowflake. modular agents, shared toolbelt, composable workflows.

references.title: VLMs
references.description: been studying mainly for robotics but also confidential surveillance assignments.

references.title: robots
references.description: studying deformables, not just sim. Also doing generative serial chains as a side project (looking for other enthusiasts [same with vlms])

references.title: scalable systems
references.description: must know skill. practiced this in almost all work.

references.title: technical depth
references.description: learn things from the ground up. reason from first principles.

references.title: high agency
references.description: operate without blanket instructions, learn by building.

references.title: cs @ Rutgers
references.description: 2nd year; taking physics and discrete 2 this semester, yet most skills come from outside class.

references.title: Centren Health
references.description: doing clinical transformers, PK/PD modeling, S3-backed pipelines.

references.title: Mesh
references.description: ai-powered collaborative knowledge system for teams; reached 600 users.

references.title: past 6 years
references.description: started in middle school with Python Turtle.
